content: पतिः [पा-डति] {@--1@} A master, lord; as in गृहपतिः. {@--2@} An owner, possessor, proprietor; क्षेत्रपतिः. {@--3@} Governor, ruler, one who presides over; ओषधीपतिः, वनस्पतिः, कुलपतिः &c. {@--4@} A husband; प्रमदाः पतिवर्त्मगा इति प्रतिपन्नं हि विचेतनैरपि <ls>Ku. 4. 33.</ls> {@--5@} A root. {@--6@} Going, motion, flight. {%--<ab>f.</ab>%} A female possessor, a mistress.
